text: I think I've narrowed down what we should get for our firewall. The Fortigate 100D is competitively priced for features at $1600. $269 for Fortinet support/year vs competitors that require the $1000+ subscription for service and support. They have a separate subscription that gives some good features, but these aren't required features as a lot of the other companies put in their subscriptions.

i have also secured a free consult with some high powered whiz at a company that advises companies on this sort of thing. i whined on ownercamp slack and an owner offered to help connect me to his guy. unread email in my inbox.
Sophos XG210 and SG210 look good too. Trying to compare.
Trying Software demo for both. Hardware looks comparable.
Sales people for Fortinet are really awkward.

Ok. Looking now for lower-end devices. Realized we do not need a 1gbps throughput when we only have a 100mbps connection. If we upgrade in the future, we'll need something better, but we can most likely go with something less expensive for now, meaning less expensive per year cost with all features.
Ok. This is a lot easier now. Sophos XG85 at $300 looks really good. $200 for license/year.
hold til we discuss with said expert, thanks
Very well. Asking actual experts. Pssh.
